profile.rol: 🖥️ Full-Stack Developer 🌱 Getting Started in Cybersecurity
profile.description:
At the beginning of 2023 I decided to change my life and professional direction and embarked on a Professional Certificate focused on full-stack tools and languages.
During this last year I demonstrated my ability to face challenges and acquire new knowledge.
Now, after learning front end programming fundamentals and back end languages, I am immersed in a cybersecurity course.

Experience1.jobTitle:
Back-End Developer at Onets SL
October 2023 - December 2023
Experience1.jobDescription:
🌐 Collaborating in the development of an interactive web platform dedicated to learning.
💻 Development of endpoints for the website using Express.js.
🛠️ Implementation and management of database connections using Express.js to ensure the integrity and efficiency of the systems.
🤖 Integration and configuration of ChatGPT as an assistant.
💡Design and develop specialized database queries, using Node.js and Express.js, to optimize the interaction between users and ChatGPT.
🚀 Assisted with the implementation of an AI through image processing, achieving a 15% enhancement of the AI.

Experience2.jobTitle:
Content Analyst and User Support at Accenture
March 2020 - Feb 2023 -- Lisbon, Portugal
Experience2.jobDescription:
🔍I review content generated by users, taking measures to ensure a safe and pleasant experience for them.
🤝I assisted users in recovering their accounts, providing empathetic support and ensuring the security of their data through meticulous identity verification processes.

Education1.jobTitle: Master's in Cybersecurity and Ethical Hacking at Adecco Foundation - 635 hours - Oct 2023 - present
Education1.jobDescription:
🌟 Proficiency in Kali Linux. Comprehensive vulnerability analysis with tools such as: Burp Suite, OWASP ZAP, Open VAS, Nessus, and others.
🐍 Ongoing training in Python programming skills, exploring offensive and defensive strategies in cybersecurity.
🔐 Identification and management of digital threats.
🛡️ Use of anonymity tools and security protocols in networks.

Education2.jobTitle:
Programming of computer systems - IFCT0609
at CDM Embajadores - 590 hours - April 2023 - Oct 2023
Education2.jobDescription:
✨ Studying a Vocational Certificate focused on full-stack development.
💻 Learning programming languages, libraries, frameworks, and other development tools such as HTML 5, CSS 3 (including Bootstrap 5), JavaScript (including Node.js and React), MySQL 8, Python, and many more.
